name: My Branching Pipeline
description: A branching pipeline that writes raw to GCS Coldline, and filtered data to BQ

parameters.name: outputPath
parameters.label: Output file location
parameters.helpText: GCS Coldline Bucket location for raw data

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.label: BigQuery output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table spec to write to, in the form 'project:dataset.table'.
